bibl.title: What is the Politeuma?

series.title: Arbeiten zur Geschichte des antiken Judentums und des Urchristentums.

bibl.note: 1. Πολίτευμα as a body with political power within a Greek polis. - 2. Other groups calling themselves πολιτεύματα. - 3. The Politeuma of the Jews (in Alexandria? - in Leontopolis? - in Berenice in Cyrenaica). - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: LÜDERITZ Gert, What is the Politeuma?
Jan Willem VAN HENTEN and Pieter Willem VAN DER HORST (Edd.), Studies in Early Jewish Epigraphy = Arbeiten zur Geschichte des antiken Judentums und des Urchristentums. 21 (Leiden, 1994) pp. 183-225.

1. Πολίτευμα as a body with political power within a Greek polis. - 2. Other groups calling themselves πολιτεύματα. - 3. The Politeuma of the Jews (in Alexandria? - in Leontopolis? - in Berenice in Cyrenaica). - Conclusion.
